scone.core



static Window window;
Gateway to the console/terminal All methods are called from here

Example:
void main()
{
    window.title = "i am happy";
    while(true)
    {
        window.clear();
        window.write(0,0, "hello world", fg(red), '!', bg(white), 42);
        window.print();
    }
}
